timeline.bodyText: not the hugest fan of bottomMost... lowest / minimum?
timeline.author: rolfyone

replies.bodyText: It's a RocksDB term - the DB is conceptually made up of a series of layers stacked on top of each other with data gradually being pushed down to the bottom layer as it's been unchanged for longer periods.  Hence, bottom-most.
replies.author: ajsutton
